page.title: 18Houses for sale in Cliffe
page.content: Tadcaster Builders have built an estate of bungalows and houses between Oxen Lane and the railway. The houses have 3 bedrooms and the bungalows 2. They all have small gardens, and solid fuel central heating. The bungalows cost about{Â£19000,}depending on the final fittings. On York Road there are two houses for sale, Holly Tree House, an old house which has been rebuilt, it has three bedrooms and costs{Â£56000.}A new house with four bedrooms was built in Holly Tree House garden and costs {Â£62000.}Both have solid fuel central heating. In Osgodby, a house called Birchfield, with 5 bedrooms and oil central heating is for sale at{Â£69000. In South Duffield a 100 year old modernised cottage with three bedrooms is for sale at{Â£49000.
